fields.title: About
fields.content:
Privacy policy

Insert privacy policy here.

Source code of the application

FinSL-signbank is an open-source application. The source code is publicly available and can be used and modified by anyone under the conditions of the license (see below).

You can find the source code of FinSL-signbank in GitHub https://github.com/Signbank/FinSL-signbank

Other Signbank versions source codes are also available in GitHub: https://github.com/Signbank

Authors of the software (see in GitHub):

FinSL-signbank is written by Steve Cassidy, Wessel Stoop and Henri Nieminen.
FinSL-signbank has been forked from NGT-signbank, which has been forked from Auslan-signbank.
FinSL-signbank is maintained by Henri Nieminen.
